topic.title: GZero - a Google for the Decentralized Web
For the first time in a while now, I bought a major amount of bitcoins
topic.body:
Bullish due to:

1. VISA is looking for a blockchain dev - https://www.cryptocoinsnews.com/visa-looks-senior-develope…/

2. Zeronet. Just wow.

3. Classic, Core ... whoever "wins" this, Bitcoin will be stronger in a few months.

4. I'm hypo-manic right now so take all this with a grain of salt ;)

topic.title: Monitization for Zero Websites?
topic.body: What are some monitization strategies for someone building a site on Zeronet?

topic.title: How do I back up my data?
topic.body:
ZeroMail just told me:

"Ps: To keep you identity safe don't forget to backup your data/users.json file!"

Let's ELI5 this: How should a Windows user backup their data? How often? Can he configure ZeroNet to just work off his dropbox? (That data should be encrypted & password protected if backed up to a 3rd party!)

topic.title: Bot to autopost ZeroTalk to reddit/r/zeronet
topic.body:
Could this be done?

(maybe to /r/zerotalk, actually)

This can expose the content here externally.

topic.title: Feedback for ZeroSearch
topic.body: This thread gathers all feedback for the ZeroSearch team

topic.title: Feedback for ZeroTalk
topic.body: This thread gathers all feedback for the ZeroTalk team

topic.title: URL Redirection
topic.body:
Could someone "register" the zero/talk domain and point it towards zero/Talk.ZeroNetwork.bit?

Something like a URL redirect?

It would be really cool to just type zero/talk into my browser (with the chrome extension) and get to ZeroTalk.

topic.title: ZeroMail support thread
topic.body: Post support questions about ZeroMail here. Hopefully someone will answer ;)

2_1KJFB4SEHaHCY11HMKsMGyth1mXKb3R5oY.body:
Integrate it into Zeronet homepage!

Also, pagerank.

https://medium.com/world-bug-repository/zerosearch-a-google-for-the-decentralized-web-b940ee66d9f3#.qng13v1fi

Also, are you looking for investors?

1_17ApQKugX1XH727gpAeD3mrRLjLxASdakd.body:
> [oresp](#comment_4_17ApQKugX1XH727gpAeD3mrRLjLxASdakd): @ripper234Yes, there are a lot of them. It's just that the ones I mentioned are in a "federation" with each other

Isn't Diaspora dead? I haven't heard of the others.

I happen to know the CEO of Synereo, that's why I plugged in - I told him today he should take a SERIOUS look at ZeroNet.

2_1GCsW9TFfjDsvcdmKPADq1n8Q3ha72UtDQ.body:
C#/Scala/Cofeescript/Javascript.

Definitely not HTML, I can't stand that shit.

6_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body:
I posted about Synereo sometime ago in ZeroTalk, which I supposed is one of the sites you index.
I searched for it now, and couldn't find it.

Is this a bug? What am I missing?

7_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body: Why can I upvote my own thread?
I should auto-follow any thread I create.
When will I be able to view a list of all the posts I've created on ZeroTalk?

> [scrub](#comment_35_1ADB7TdX2fVbTsWBoMe9yBTmVXTbb33b4R): And comment.

Commenting on my own thread makes sense, voting on my own does not. Just copy reddit functionality.

When typing a comment, press TAB then space to submit it.
(Didn't work when I tried it now)

Allow me to delete my posts & comments from ZeroTalk.
(Deletion doesn't prevent someone from caching the content themselves, just effectively hides them).

While we're at it, allow me to edit my posts.

2_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body: @odd - I believe that private blockchains will need to 'back' their value in some major public blockchain/s like Bitcoin.

10_1MxdAjWgnqwCaunGHmhY39tVR51qV3peJL.body:

I guess this is actually a question for ZeroID, right?
